name: Undercity
description: Undercity is a challenging action game about rushing through tunnels on a jet-powered board at high speed. Dodge whatever comes your way and unlock new powers as you progress. The game was created entirely by a single developer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 6870 series card or higher Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 series card or higher Storage: 600 MB available space
